title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python scripts and applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM or chat components in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) with multi-user support, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (kevinw/py-ollama)
summary: Lightweight Python CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API with interactive chat mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama-hosted LLMs to be used in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any Discord server.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models with local storage of conversations.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama models into the editor for code explanation, generation, and chat.

title: ollama-express
summary: Starter repo showing how to embed Ollama into an Express.js REST API with SSE streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to a local Ollama instance for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query Ollama models privately without leaving Slack.
